metadata.title: CVE-2022-47090 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
GPAC MP4box 2.1-DEV-rev574-g9d5bb184b contains a buffer overflow ingf_vvc_read_pps_bs_internal function of media_tools/av_parsers.c, checkneeded for num_exp_tile_columns

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-47090` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gpac - 2.2.1+dfsg1-3.1build2
gpac-modules-base - 2.2.1+dfsg1-3.1build2
libgpac12t64 - 2.2.1+dfsg1-3.1build2
No subscription required

criterions.comment: gpac package in noble, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.2.1+dfsg1-3.1build2').
